query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS answer_sheets (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  assessmentId INT NOT NULL,
  studentId INT NOT NULL,
  sheetCode VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  qrCode VARCHAR(255),
  status ENUM('pending', 'in_progress', 'submitted', 'correcting', 'corrected', 'reviewed') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  totalScore INT,
  percentageScore FLOAT,
  correctAnswers INT,
  wrongAnswers INT,
  blankAnswers INT,
  startedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  submittedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  correctedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  correctedBy INT,
  teacherNotes TEXT,
  studentNotes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4EmYiUJsZhACerp.0e9436e27250 --database c6FhCpifoFzEQqXNtsKEU6 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS answer_sheets (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  assessmentId INT NOT NULL,
  studentId INT NOT NULL,
  sheetCode VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL UNIQUE,
  qrCode VARCHAR(255),
  status ENUM('pending', 'in_progress', 'submitted', 'correcting', 'corrected', 'reviewed') DEFAULT 'pending' NOT NULL,
  totalScore INT,
  percentageScore FLOAT,
  correctAnswers INT,
  wrongAnswers INT,
  blankAnswers INT,
  startedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  submittedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  correctedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  correctedBy INT,
  teacherNotes TEXT,
  studentNotes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
